actions.description: The leviathan makes one Slam attack and one Tail attack.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 14 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (2d12 + 8) bludgeoning damage plus 13 (2d12) acid damage.
actions.name: Slam

actions.description: 14 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (2d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) acid damage.
actions.name: Tail

actions.description: The leviathan magically creates a wave of water that extends from a point it can see within 120 feet of itself. The wave is up to 250 feet long, up to 250 feet tall, and up to 50 feet wide. Each creature in the wave must make a DC 24 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 45 (7d12) bludgeoning damage and is knocked prone. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked prone. The water spreads out across the ground in all directions, extinguishing unprotected flames in its area and within 250 feet of it, and then it vanishes.
actions.name: Tidal Wave (Recharge 6)

actions.description: The leviathan moves up to its speed.
actions.name: Move

actions.description: The leviathan makes one Slam attack.
actions.name: Slam (Costs 2 Actions)

conditionImmunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, stunned
name: Leviathan [MoM]
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

specialTraits.description: If the leviathan fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
specialTraits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)

specialTraits.description: If the leviathan takes 50 cold damage or more during a single turn, the leviathan partially freezes; until the end of its next turn, its speeds are reduced to 20 feet, and it makes attack rolls with disadvantage.
specialTraits.name: Partial Freeze

specialTraits.description: The leviathan deals double damage to objects and structures.
specialTraits.name: Siege Monster

specialTraits.description: The leviathan can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.
specialTraits.name: Water Form
